body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Christian Davis. May I have your name, please?

Hi Christian, this is Christina Hall.

Thank you, Christina. How can I assist you today?

I'm a bit disappointed with an unexpected charge on my account. Can you help me with that?

I'm sorry to hear that, Christina. Could you please provide your account number so I can take a look at your billing details?

Sure, my account number is four five six seven eight nine.

Thank you, Christina. Could you also please confirm the last four digits of your phone number?

Of course, it's one two three four.

I appreciate your patience, Christina. It seems there was an error in invoicing. I will correct this immediately, and you'll see the adjustment on your next statement.

Thank you, Christian. I feel better knowing it's being handled.

You're welcome, Christina. I apologize for the inconvenience, and thank you for your understanding. If there's anything else you need, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

Will do, thank you. Goodbye.

Thank you, Christian. I feel better knowing it's being handled.

You're welcome, Christina. I apologize for the inconvenience, and thank you for your understanding. If there's anything else you need, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
